mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Frost, Daniel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 4 1863. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 4 1863. Send me my two 2 pieces of artillery & five hundred 500 guns for the militia I have but nine hundred 900 effective men the gunboat will remain. I am ordered by Genl Roberts to send out a force alone the Railroad D Frost Col 40w131coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Frost, Daniel
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
